text: Gudjon Lincoln Johnson (January 29, 1899 - November 8, 1970) was a Canadian curler. He was the second of the 1934 Brier Champion team (skipped by his brother Leo), representing Manitoba."Obituaries", Winnipeg Free Press, Tuesday, November 10, 1970, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada, pg 27 ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1899 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg Category:Canadian people of Icelandic descent Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Linc Johnson
